name: df-afv2
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1
body: |- wceq(cafv2(c0, c1), cif(cio(s0, wbr(c1, c0, cv(s0))), cpw(cuni(crn(c0))), wdfat(c0, c1)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (c0 '''' c1)= if(c0[defAt]c1, iota(s0, c1[c0]s0), P(⋃ ran(c0)))
comment: Alternate definition of the value of a function, ` ( F '''' A ) ` , also known as function application (and called "alternate function value" in the following). In contrast to ` ( F `` A ) = (/) ` (see comment of ~ df-fv , and especially ~ ndmfv ), ` ( F '''' A ) ` is guaranteed not to be in the range of ` F ` if ` F ` is not defined at ` A ` (whereas ` (/) ` can be a member of ` ran F ` ). (Contributed by AV, 2-Sep-2022.)
